# KDE job to run multiple profiles, scorecards and/or mappings
# Check the sample job for comments on the key words and structure of job definition files
# @Since: 09-NOV-2016
# @Version: 20161109.0  #- Initial version
# @Author: Jac. Beekers
#
# Note: The following structure will also work in FitNesse. Therefore, the first line starts with Table:
|Table:Job Definition                                                                                                                                                                                   |
|KDE|KDE Profile Job                       |Version=20161118.0|Persistence=Yes|Max Concurrent=2               |IDQConfig=/rabo/sserole/tws/config/idq.cfg|PWCConfig=/rabo/sserole/tws/config/pwc_idq.cfg|
|Steps                                                                                                                                                                                                  |
|10 |Run Profile NPSBLKDE                  |Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_NP_SBL_KDE                 |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|20 |Run Profile_ldo_NP_DMC_KDE_CHK        |Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_DMC_KDE_CHK         |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|30 |Run Profile_ldo_NP_DMC_KlantStatus_CHK|Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_DMC_KlantStatus_CHK |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|40 |Run Profile_ldo_NP_RDV_KDE_CHK        |Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_RDV_KDE_CHK         |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|50 |Run Profile_ldo_NP_RDV_KlantStatus_CHK|Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_RDV_KlantStatus_CHK |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|60 |Run Profile_ldo_NP_STI_KDE_CHK        |Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_STI_KDE_CHK         |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|70 |Run Profile_ldo_NP_STI_KlantStatus_CHK|Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_STI_KlantStatus_CHK |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|80 |Run Profile_ldo_NP_STO_KDE_CHK        |Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_STO_KDE_CHK         |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|90 |Run Profile_ldo_NP_STO_KlantStatus_CHK|Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_STO_KlantStatus_CHK |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|100|Run Profile_ldo_NP_SBL_KDE_CHK        |Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_SBL_KDE_CHK         |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|110|Run Profile_ldo_NP_SBL_KlantStatus_CHK|Run IDQ           |profile        |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=Profile_ldo_NP_SBL_KlantStatus_CHK |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |

|Table:Job Definition                                                                                                                                                                            |
|KDE|KDE Scorecard Job              |Version=20161113.0|Persistence=Yes|Max Concurrent=2               |IDQConfig=/rabo/sserole/tws/config/idq.cfg|PWCConfig=/rabo/sserole/tws/config/pwc_idq.cfg|
|Steps                                                                                                                                                                                           |
|10 |Run scDWHDKeyDataElementen     |Run IDQ           |scorecard      |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=scDWHDKeyDataElementen             |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
|20 |Run sc_SBL_ORG_KeyDataElementen|Run IDQ           |scorecard      |project=KDE_5_Profile_Scorecard|object=sc_SBL_ORG_KeyDataElementen        |result=OK    |On Error=CONTINUE    |Wait=No   |
